title: F/S - T206 Bobby Wallace - SOV 350 - PSA 3

posts.post_title: F/S - T206 Bobby Wallace - SOV 350 - PSA 3
posts.post_content: Up for sale by Paypal F/F is a T-206 Bobby Wallace (HOF) in a PSA 3. Sovereign 350 back, great centering. See scans. Price is SOLD with free USPS shipping with tracking. Paypal address is [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks,  Bill
